q: Eric Schmidt explained the move in a blog post saying,`` We have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.'' He added, managing the business has become more complicated, and Google wanted to`` speed up decision making,'' so Larry Page got the nod. says,`` Larry Page , in my clear opinion, is ready to lead.''
